entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:06 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
